author: The Hairy Bikers
method: Put the garlic, horseradish and horseradish leaves in the bottom of a large sterilised jar and add the cucumbers.  Add the salt to 2 litres/3Â½ pints water and mix thoroughly. Pour the salted water over the cucumbers, screw on the lid and leave to rest for 24 hours.  The cucumbers will keep in the fridge for one month.
ingredients: 3 garlic cloves,  2 tbsp horseradish,  2 horseradish leaves,  10 small pickling cucumbers, washed,  2 tbsp salt
